attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Blossom Goodchild has channelled a message from the lightship that for a minimum of three days from 14th October they will appear in our skies in an immense ship so that no-one can deny their existence. They come in peace and love to help us out of this mess.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
